mapper.sql: select FEEDBACK_ID, PLAN_ID, UNITS_ID, FILE_NAME, FILE_CODE, MAIN_COMPANY_ID, MAIN_COMPANY_NAME, COPY_COMPANY_ID, COPY_COMPANY_NAME, TO_DO_TIME, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TIME, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_TIME, ENT_ID from inspection_feedback
mapper.select: select u.UNITS_ID,u.ORG_ID,u.ORG_NAME,u.created_time, count(d.UNITS_ID) as count from inspection_units u left join inspection_feedback d on u.UNITS_ID = d.UNITS_ID where u.plan_id = #{planId} group by u.UNITS_ID order by u.created_time, u.UNITS_ID desc
